content:
Ciao! I'm an italian photographer based in London.

I feel thereâ€™s an invisible reality hiding behind the one I see with my eyes. It speaks a forgotten language and moves at a different speed.

With my work, I seek to get in touch with that realm and my camera becomes a tool for meditation, while developing the negatives is a sacred ceremony, a way to be present, to slow down and witness beauty unfold.

Each photograph is an attempt to hold onto something intangible, a glimpse of my inner world reflected in the mirror of the material one.
